Title: Relates to the distribution of pre-criminal proceeding settlements in the city of New York
Summary: Relates to the distribution of pre-criminal proceeding settlements in the city of New York and to the effectiveness of thereof.
LawCode: Amd ยง95.00, CP L; amd part F ยง2, Chap 55 of 2018
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to pre-criminal proceeding settlements in the city of New York; and to amend chapter 55 of the laws of 2018 amending the criminal procedure law relating to pre-criminal proceeding settlements in the city of New York, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
